CustomField.description: This picklist indicates what output (work order, quote, etc) will result from confirmed Change Order search Results. As of 20.2, work order is the only delivery method available.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This picklist indicates what output (work order, quote, etc) will result from confirmed Change Order search Results. As of 20.2, work order is the only delivery method available.
CustomField.label: Delivery Method
